title: The plan shall be coloured as specified in Table No
clause_text: The plan shall be coloured as specified in Table No.2-B given below and prints of plan shall be on one side of the paper only.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
